column5: Beautiful, spacious, newly furnished 1b1b with additional 1 sofa bed and 1 queen-sized air mattress. Accommodates 2-6 people comfortably - great for business or family/friends. Equipped with full kitchen, fast Wifi, washer & dryer.   \t10 min to Energy Corridor  \t15 min to Memorial  \t15 min to Citycenter  \t25 min to the Galleria  \t30 min to NRG Stadium  \t30 min to Rice University  \t35 min to downtown Houston  \t35 min to Texas Medical Center  \t35 min to Convention Center  \t1 hr to Space Center
